data.text: @ILoveKindness2 @mattdizwhitlock @KatiePavlich @FoxNews @GOP Have you heard how rape has skyrocketed in Europe because of those immigrants?
@aorgat @mattdizwhitlock @KatiePavlich Democrat Part; offering crap then whining and bitching because Republicans won't go along with it.
@beingfrancake @mattdizwhitlock How does having poor people pay for student debt benefit them?

@mattdizwhitlock Hey Matt, I’m a hardcore conservative but I have to say I take issue with your comment. Not your not wanting tax payers to float the bill for student loans, but your lumping all of is with student loans together with your stupid wealth comment. I was just laid off, wife, 3 kids…
@xxfizax @mattdizwhitlock You should read the terms of a loan agreement before signing your name.
@mattdizwhitlock Yes, and to get ridiculous graduate degree like Gender Studies, Equity and Justice, and Misinformation Management. #TheCultofWokeism

@willows_2 @mattdizwhitlock It’s almost like you didn’t have to take one out. So are mortgages and car loans. So are credit card bills. It should all be free so people like you, who make poor economic decisions can face no consequences of those decisions.

@mattdizwhitlock @KatiePavlich I've been paying on mine. No interest? Fuckin go to town. Anybody who's not doubling down on their payments is just losing out in the long run lol. People are ass backwards and this administration is just feasting.
